    • Constructor Detail

      • GameImpl

        public GameImpl(java.lang.String levelsFilePath,
                java.lang.String highestScoreFilePath)
        Initialize all attributes to play a game Steps : - Read content of levelsFilePath - Split the read content into chunks, each chunk containing infos about a level (ordered) - Create the levels with the attributes - Create the other important attributes to create/fill Data/GameImpl (PacMan, ...) - Read content of highestScoreFilePath - Extract highest score information from the read file - Initialize logic/GameImpl with required attributes
        Parameters:
        levelsFilePath - path (absolute or relative) to a file containing levels (see data/ for structure)
        highestScoreFilePath - path (absolute or relative) to a file containing highestScore (positive integer on the first line)

      • compute

        public void compute(int direction)
        Move PacMan in the right direction Check Move Ghosts Check Change PacMan coords
        Specified by:
        compute in interface Game
        Parameters:
        direction - 1 = UP ; 2 = RIGHT ; 3 = DOWN ; 4 = LEFT default to 0, if zero pacman doesn't move
